extension.name: Extended Menu
extension.author: Daniel Ecer
extension.description:
This Extended Menu module displays a menu in a flexible way. Please visit de.siteof.de for more details.
To use this module don't forget to publish it (and probably unpublish the default mainmenu module).

(If you like this module please consider a donation.)

field.name: class_sfx
field.label: Menu Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items

field.name: id_suffix
field.label: Menu ID Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the (active) menu ids - by default this will be the same as the class suffix. But you may want to select another suffix if the same class suffix is to applied to more than one menu (two identical ids on the same page would be invalid)

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: cache
field.label: Enable Cache
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

field.name: menutype
field.label: Menu Name
field.description: The name of the menu (default is 'mainmenu')

field.name: menu_source_type
field.label: Source Type
field.description: Source type to use.

field.name: menu_source_value
field.label: Source Value
field.description: Ids depending on Source Type (category ids or content item ids - it is also possible to specify the name/alias instead).

field.name: menu_source_show_category
field.label: Show Category
field.description: Define which elements to should be linkable (if visible).

field.name: menu_source_show_content_item
field.label: Show Content Item
field.description: Define which elements to should be linkable (if visible).

field.name: menu_source_order
field.label: Order
field.description: Define which elements to should be linkable (if visible).

field.name: default_content_itemid
field.label: Default Itemid
field.description: Defines a default menu item which is used for the content items to reduce duplicate URLs. (see also Resolve Itemid)

field.name: menu_style
field.label: Menu Style
field.description: The menu style

field.name: menu_view_plugin_name
field.label: Menu View Plugin Name
field.description: The name of the menu view plugin you want to show.

field.name: menu_images
field.label: Show Menu Icons
field.description: Show the Menu Icons you have selected for your menu items

field.name: expand_menu
field.label: Expand Menu
field.description: Expand the menu and make its sub-menus items always visible

field.name: expand_min
field.label: Expand Until Level
field.description: All menu items until the given level will always be expanded.

field.name: max_depth
field.label: Maximum Depth
field.description: Levels with a level higher than the maximum depth will never be expanded.

field.name: hide_first
field.label: Hide First Entry
field.description: The first menu item will not be rendered. (This is useful when setting the first entry to what your home page should be, but you dont want it to show.)

field.name: show_parent
field.label: Show Parent
field.description: Shows the parent of the menu.

field.name: parent_item
field.label: Parent Menu Item
field.description: The parent menu item (Itemid/Name) to use as the parent.

field.name: current_level_begin
field.label: Begin With Current Item Level
field.description: Begins with the level of the currently selected item.

field.name: level_begin
field.label: Begin With Level
field.description: Begins with a certain level/level - useful to split menu into different modules.

field.name: split_menu
field.label: Split Menu
field.description: The amount of levels/depth until a new menu within this module will be rendered.

field.name: menu_count
field.label: Menu Count
field.description: The amount of menus to render within this module.

field.name: query_cache
field.label: Enable Query Cache
field.description: Select whether to cache the query of this module (may be useful for menus splitted into modules)

field.name: parse_access_key
field.label: Parse Access Key
field.description: Defines how to parse/strip the access key markup.

field.name: title_attribute
field.label: Link Title
field.description: A title attribute may be added to links (useful in combination to show the access key).

field.name: level_class
field.label: Level Class
field.description: Defines which level class should be applied (mainlevel/sublevel).

field.name: active_menu_class
field.label: Active Menu Class
field.description: Active menus may get the style class mainlevel_active/sublevel_active.

field.name: element_id
field.label: Element Id
field.description: Each element may get an id based on the hierarchy... for example menuitem_2_5 for the 5th sub menu item of the 2nd menu item. (Note: this conflicts with the active_menu id which will removed... use the above setting instead)

field.name: menu_template
field.label: Enable Menu Template
field.description: Enable Menu Template (patTemplate).

field.name: menu_template_name
field.label: Template Name
field.description: The patTemplate template to use (need to be in the current site templates directory).

field.name: spacer
field.label: Spacer
field.description: Spacer for Horizontal menu

field.name: end_spacer
field.label: End Spacer
field.description: End Spacer for Horizontal menu

field.name: select_list_submit_text
field.label: Select List Submit Text
field.description: Text for the submit button

field.name: select_list_submit_hide
field.label: Hide Submit Button
field.description: Defines whether the submit button should be hidden.

field.name: call_getitemid
field.label: Resolve Itemid By Content Item
field.description: Resolve Itemid by content item (calls getItemid)... set this to No if you want to link multiple times to the same content item.

field.name: current_item
field.label: Current/Active Item Highlighting
field.description: Define which item should be the current/active one - using the fastest but may not lead to the desired result.

field.name: current_item_duplicates
field.label: Current Item Duplicates
field.description: Defines what to do when duplicate items were found which would otherwise produce invalid HTML.

field.name: access_keys
field.label: Access Keys
field.description: Additional access key mapping (comma separated association of Itemid/Name=AK - without a left side the position is assumed, e.g. 1=1,exmenu=m,3).

field.name: exact_access_level
field.label: Exact Access Level
field.description: If set to yes, public menu items will be shown to when not logged in only.
